snippet.title: Chimera - Official Reveal Trailer | PC Gaming Show 2023
snippet.description:
Chimera is a sci-fi first-person co-op shooter combining base building, exploration, combat, and resource management. Set on an alien planet, the environment is torn apart by a catastrophic cycle of destruction caused by its titular star. Players can team up with up to 4 players to take on waves of hostile enemy monsters all while facing the planet’s fiery inferno or extreme cold. Chimera is launching on PC soon.

#SummerOfGaming
